headline.print_headline: Prosecutor: Hawaii Prison Gang 'Kings of Castle'
headline.main: Prosecutor: Hawaii Prison Gang 'Kings of Castle'

docs.snippet: A Hawaii prison gang formed out of a need for inmate protection evolved into a violent organization whose members are "kings of their castle," a federal prosecutor told a jury Wednesday at the start of a racketeering trial for a former prison guar...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Hawaii prison gang formed out of a need for inmate protection evolved into a violent organization whose members are "kings of their castle," a federal prosecutor told a jury Wednesday at the start of a racketeering trial for a former prison guard and an inmate.

headline.print_headline: Charges Tossed in Death of Disabled New York Girl
headline.main: Charges Tossed in Death of Disabled New York Girl

docs.snippet: Homicide charges have been dismissed — at least temporarily — against a couple accused of killing the woman's severely disabled daughter by withholding food and medical care....
docs.lead_paragraph: Homicide charges have been dismissed — at least temporarily — against a couple accused of killing the woman's severely disabled daughter by withholding food and medical care.

headline.print_headline: Tigers Beat White Sox 6-1, Clinch Postseason Spot

headline.print_headline: NYC Transportation Plan May Not Be Funded for Years: Official
headline.main: NYC Transportation Plan May Not Be Funded for Years: Official

docs.snippet: New York's Metropolitan Transportation Authority passed a 5-year investment program with a $15.2 billion shortfall on Wednesday, and its chief executive said it may take years before the agency secures full funding....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York's Metropolitan Transportation Authority passed a 5-year investment program with a $15.2 billion shortfall on Wednesday, and its chief executive said it may take years before the agency secures full funding.

headline.main: Security Council Passes Resolution to Thwart Foreign Fighters

docs.snippet: The United Nations Security Council adopted a legally binding resolution compelling countries to “prevent” and “suppress” their citizens from traveling abroad to join terrorist organizations....
docs.abstract: The United Nations Security Council adopted a legally binding resolution compelling countries to “prevent” and “suppress” their citizens from traveling abroad to join terrorist organizations.

headline.print_headline: Review: Samsung Alpha Big on Design, Short on Tech
headline.main: Review: Samsung Alpha Big on Design, Short on Tech

docs.snippet: Apple filled a gaping hole in its product lineup with new iPhones boasting larger screens like Samsung's flagship Galaxy smartphones. Now, Samsung is coming out with a smaller phone that looks and feels more like an iPhone....
docs.lead_paragraph: Apple filled a gaping hole in its product lineup with new iPhones boasting larger screens like Samsung's flagship Galaxy smartphones. Now, Samsung is coming out with a smaller phone that looks and feels more like an iPhone.

headline.main: A Very British Dining Destination Pops Up on the Lower East Side

docs.snippet: Mile High, a travel-themed dinner series, comes stateside for the first time to serve up Taittinger bubbles and treacle tart to adventurous New Yorkers....
